body:
Adds a package for the `cvxopt` convex optimization solver. Passes all tests with and without optional dependencies on macOS 10.13.3 with Clang 9.0.0.

I didn't add a package for Mosek because it's proprietary and I couldn't figure out how to get it to build. Conda builds Mosek, so it should be doable. Can anyone find Conda's build recipe for Mosek?

Depends on #7526 (which has now been merged).
title: Add py-cvxopt package
